```{r loadLibraries}
library(tidyr)
library (dplyr)
library (ggplot2)
library(agricolae)
library(knitr)
library (lubridate)

```


```{r loadFile}
setwd("C:\\Users\\EdCarmen\\Documents\\CarmenProjects2016\\GitSubclover\\GCFlower")
getwd()

#create file
df_GCF <- read.table("GCFlow.txt",header=TRUE)

head(df_GCF)

summary(df_GCF)

# convert to date format
df_GCF <- df_GCF %>%
mutate(DateReading=dmy(DateReading),SowingD=dmy(SowingD), 
       Percent=(S1+S2)/2*100)
str(df_GCF)
head(df_GCF)
summary(df_GCF)
tail(df_GCF)
```

Parei aqui! 
Analysis of sowing date and cultivars for Bud considering Date 

```{r GraphBoxPlotBud}

head(df_GCF)
 df_GCF %>%
  group_by(DAS, Cultivar,SowingD,Variable)%>%
  summarise_each(funs(mean)) %>%
  select(Variable,Percent, Cultivar,SowingD)%>%
  filter(Variable == "Bud") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=DAS, y=Percent)) + 
  geom_line(aes(colour=Cultivar)) +
   geom_point(aes(colour=Cultivar))+
  #facet_grid(.~Cultivar, scales = "free")+
  #facet_grid(Cultivar~., scales = "free")+
  geom_abline(intercept = 50, slope = 0) 
  
```
